channel.title: Void Handcannon Pure
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b]What is a Void Handcannon Pure?[/b][/size] A void hand cannon pure is a type of pure that has completed all of the quests for a handcannon, a preferably high range level, and has the minimum stat requirements for void.
[size=14pt][b]Goals[/b][/size]
[b]▲Quests▲[/b] (Please note these are just the important quests, there are many other minor ones) Fishing Contest Dwarf Cannon The Giant Dwarf Between A Rock... Animal Magnetism Mountain Daughter Dragon Slayer Forgettable Tale of a Drunken Dwarf Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf
[b]▲Skills▲[/b] 17 Farming 22 Cooking 75 Range 42 Defence 42 Attack 56 Strength (will be higher after Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf) 61 Hunter 50 Smithing 40 Mining 10 Fishing 42 Magic 70 Firemaking (less likely chance for cannon to explode) 15 Thieving 18 Slayer 19 Crafting 35 Woodcutting 22 Prayer
[b]▲Misc▲[/b] Void Top Void Bottoms Void Range Helm Void Gloves
[size=14pt][b]Current Stats[/b][/size] (It is usually higher than what it says because tip.it doesn't update until the RuneScape highscores updates) [img]http://sign.tip.it/1/2/18/41/Gfspec.png[/img] Thanks to tip.it
[size=14pt][b]Credits[/b][/size] -RuneHQ for quest guides and skill calculators -friends for support -I Vain I for cash for a cannon :) [IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/gfspecmoparvain.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Void Handcannon Pure
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“DevilsCape, post:6, topic:402884”]i wonder if thats a guide or ur goal

anyways gl … and i understood what u mean by void handcannon pure ^^ >>

btw u can get handcannon much from handcannoners… u might get a d pickaxe and sell it there for 11mill by mistake :P:P

anyways gl bro

update it daily[/quote]Thanks man, when I get the basic requirements I have listed I’ll most likely make a pk video for you guys.

And that’d be epic if I got a d pick L0l.

Read full topic

item.title: Void Handcannon Pure
item.dc:creator: @DevilsCape DevilsCape
item.description:
@DevilsCape wrote:

i wonder if thats a guide or ur goal

anyways gl … and i understood what u mean by void handcannon pure ^^ >>

btw u can get handcannon much from handcannoners… u might get a d pickaxe and sell it there for 11mill by mistake :P:P

anyways gl bro

update it daily

item.description:

Do you plan on getting defence up with range?
[/quote]Defence is already 42, that’s the minimum requirement for void.[/quote]

I mean higher than 42, because if it stays there I think this will fail.

[center][size=14pt]What is a Void Handcannon Pure?[/size]
A void hand cannon pure is a type of pure that has completed all of the quests for a
handcannon, a preferably high range level, and has the minimum stat requirements for void.

[size=14pt]Goals[/size]

50 Smithing
40 Mining

70 Firemaking (less likely chance for cannon to explode)
